name: FCameraAnimationParams
doc: Parameter struct for adding new camera animations to UCameraAnimationCameraModifier

PlayRate: Time scale for playing the new camera animation
Scale: Global scale to use for the new camera animation
bLoop: Whether the camera animation should loop
StartOffset: Offset, in frames, into the animation to start at
bRandomStartTime: Whether the camera animation should have a random start time
DurationOverride: Override the duration of the animation with a new duration (including blends)
PlaySpace: The transform space to use for the new camera shake
UserPlaySpaceRot: User space to use when PlaySpace is UserDefined
